name: This & That
description:
A short climbing game which goes on for one minute wherein the player controls keep getting inverted and the platform to climb keeps getting changed.

Yes you will be stepping on air and will pass through solid blocks.

The combination of the two makes this game very challenging to the player because as soon as you get use to one condition it changes.

Bugs

1. Retry button doesnt work

2. Player can get stuck in between blocks while the condition changes.
